name: Market Maker
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 50 along with Roitchie (ldjam.com/users/roitchie)

Delay the economy crashing in the card game Market Maker. The new US president is trying to tank the economy and your job as the market maker is to keep the economy afloat.

Drag and drop cards to increase the economy while the president tries to get the economy to 0. However this game is stacked against you and the president will stop at nothing to ruin the economy. Delay the inevitable and try and survive as long as possible.
